timeline.bodyText:
This becomes public API, so I do not understand why that is necessary for fixing an NPE?
It also does not seem to be used at all.
timeline.author: kaikreuzer

replies.bodyText: Yes, you are right. this method is not needed at all. I removed it.
replies.author: cweitkamp
